quote: With everything so perfect, reality seemed somehow fragile, as if the slightest interruption could imperil her pretty future... all of it felt as tenuous as a soap bubble, shivering and empty.
quote_letters: WITH EVERYTHING SO PERFECT REALITY SEEMED SOMEHOW FRAGILE AS IF THE SLIGHTEST INTERRUPTION COULD IMPERIL HER PRETTY FUTURE ALL OF IT FELT AS TENUOUS AS A SOAP BUBBLE SHIVERING AND EMPTY
